This Western film stars some familiar faces like Dana Delany and Powers Boothe, and it follows the story of a retired lawman who gets drawn back into action by outlaws he's fought before.

Another captivating choice is "Man on the Moon" (1999), a biographical film about the life and career of the enigmatic comedian Andy Kaufman. With an impressive cast including Danny DeVito, Judd Hirsch, and Courtney Love, this film offers a unique exploration into the world of comedy and eccentricity. Enjoy your movie nights!

It's a captivating documentary that showcases one of the greatest musicians of our time performing live on stage, with restored and remastered sound for optimal viewing experience. Enjoy!
